title: Best of the Program | Guest: Rep. Andy Barr | 9/29/22
description:
Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to go over President Biden's mental state after he searched for a former representative who passed away at a speaking event. Rep. Andy Barr joins Glenn to expose the dangers of a central bank digital currency and share what can be done to avoid it. Glenn shares the story of the biggest robbery in history, done by the FBI.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
